value:
Abyss is home to the Ashen Wolves,
those who shun the light of day. It is
the secret shadow of Garreg Mach.

Like the gilded wyvern taking refuge
in its cave, in time, I too shall soar
free and have my nobility restored!

If I may presume to offer my opinion,
summoning me was a very keen
decision, $Nu!

Are you captivated by my charms?
Ahahaha! This happens all the time to
those of us blessed with such beauty.

Even standing beside such great
Heroes, I still shine remarkably...
You sense my genius, do you not?

I trust you have been well?
Naturally, I was sent to greet you in
$Nf's stead.

I've done it! I've improved
on perfection!
There's no masking my splendor.
My next effort shall compensate.

What noble power! This will be of use
to me in restoring the splendor of
House Nuvelle!

I'm Constance von Nuvelle! Tremble
before my noble magic! Ahahaha!

Oh, it's you! You've arrived at the
perfect time, $Nu!$k$pI was hoping to speak to you about
assisting me in achieving my dream of
revitalizing House Nuvelle!$k$pWe will wait until the conflict in Askr
has concluded, of course, but I then
expect your presence in Fódlan.$k$pAre you not willing? Helping me to
achieve my dream would be an honor
for any—wait! Where are you going?!$k$pHmm? Oh! The dreadful sunlight is
peeking through the clouds! Please...$k$pPlease excuse my cavalier behavior...
If I have upset you, I request that you
please punish me accordingly...$k$pWhat's this? You grant me
forgiveness for the way I spoke?
Such words are wasted on me...
はっ
それっ
くっ
きゃああああっ
Ahaha!
Look upon your doom!
Shall I test your defense?
Respect your betters!
It cannot end here...
Ahaha!
I am Constance von Nuvelle. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
Ah! Such rudeness is beneath you, surely.

Though House Nuvelle has fallen, it is still every
noble's duty to provide for the commonfolk.

Abyssians tend to be the first suspects
whenever there is foul play.

Do you have some need of me? I assure you, I am
busier than I may seem.
This castle has far too many bright spots. I must be on my guard.
My superior spellcraft is yours.
Very well.
Are you certain?
Let us proceed.
